0.2.0.name: chai-nightwatch
0.2.0.description: This is a modified version of Chai to support Nightwatch.js asserts.
0.2.0.readme:
## Chai expect adapter for Nightwatch.js

This is a modified version of Chai to support Nightwatch.js asserts.

Chai is a BDD / TDD assertion library for [node](http://nodejs.org) and the browser that
can be delightfully paired with any javascript testing framework.

For more information or to download plugins, view the [documentation](http://chaijs.com).

## License

readme:
## Chai expect adapter for Nightwatch.js

This is a modified version of Chai to support Nightwatch.js asserts.

Chai is a BDD / TDD assertion library for [node](http://nodejs.org) and the browser that
can be delightfully paired with any javascript testing framework.

For more information or to download plugins, view the [documentation](http://chaijs.com).
